name: Orestis Bouras
story: Aris Malas comes from a military family and has been a soldier all his life. He is loyal to his country and his comrades, but has become somewhat jaded and cynical after years of service. He takes his duties as an Ammo Bearer seriously and will not let his team down in the field. Outside of work, he enjoys spending time with his wife and children, and attending church on Sundays.
